Gedatsu's Accidental Blue-Sea Life, Chapters 314 to 348, Volumes 33 to 37.


Short Summary


After Gedatsu loses his battle to Chopper and falls from Skypiea, through a series of accidents and coincidences, he ends up as the business partner of Goro, Koza's uncle, and helps him found a hot spring resort in Ukkari Hot-Spring Island.
